author: Reuters Editorial
title: Casella Waste Systems Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.46
text:
March 1 (Reuters) - Casella Waste Systems Inc:
* CASELLA WASTE SYSTEMS, INC. ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER AND FISCAL YEAR 2017 RESULTS; AND PROVIDES FISCAL YEAR 2018 GUIDANCE
* SEES FY 2018 REVENUE UP 4.6 TO 6.3 PERCENT * SEES 2018 ‍ADJUSTED EBITDA BETWEEN $135 MILLION AND $139 MILLION​
* SEES ‍2018 REVENUES BETWEEN $618 MILLION AND $628 MILLION​
* SEES ‍2018 NORMALIZED FREE CASH FLOW BETWEEN $42 MILLION AND $46 MILLION​ Source text for Eikon:
